item.title: ‘Star Trek: Lower Decks’ finds riches in its own margins
item.description: ‘Star Trek: Lower Decks’ finds riches in its own margins It’s been a long road, getting from Lower Decks’ slightly rough-around-the-edges first episode to here.

item.title: YouTube adds pinch-to-zoom on mobile as part of its latest redesign
item.description: YouTube adds pinch-to-zoom on mobile as part of its latest redesign YouTube is getting a fresh look and some extra features.

item.title: The Morning After: Bono finally apologizes for that free iTunes U2 album
item.description: The Morning After: Bono finally apologizes for that free iTunes U2 album Once upon a time, back in 2014, U2 gave away an album's worth of songs to every iTunes user in the world.
